name: Super Mega Death Pong
description:
Originally released on February 7th, 2020.

Pong, a simple word, a simple game. What if we took a classic and turned it into something evil? Super Mega Death Pong, or simply Death Pong, is the result. Don't be surprised by how difficult the game and how you most likely won't succeed in completing it the first time around. Failing is just a part of the equation.

F E A T U R E S

• 25 increasingly difficult levels, each may add more obstacles to clear. Additionally, there are boss fights in this game, for some reason.

• A variety of obstacles. From something cheap such as expanded paddles, minion paddles to walls and portals, to being able to shoot laser beams, the game spices up as you play.

• A "Bullet Time" mechanic which can assist you in catching or passing the ball, as well as slowing down enemy projectiles.

• 10 additional color schemes, the game is more than just black and white. "Ooh, pretty colors."

• Original soundtrack.

• Oh yeah, once you die, you start over, deal with it.

C O N T R O L S

• [W][A][S][D]: Move, [A] and [D] make you lean, which is a very important mechanic for directing the ball.

• [Shift]: Bullet Time, or Ball Time in this case.

• Numbers from [0] to [9]: Change colors.

• [ESC]: Pause.

• [Backspace] (while unpaused): Title screen.

C R E D I T S

Concept: Hellzy and my high school class. Programming, GFX, SFX: Hellzy Soundtrack: Shihotori, Obskoflos Special thanks to our friends for playtesting the game during its early stages, as well as Y O U for giving it a go right now. Made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5.
